mapper.select:
SELECT N.RW, N.FREE_NO, N.NICKNAME, N.TITLE, N.CONTENT, N.CREATE_DATE, N.MODIFY_DATE, N.HIT, N.IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_NO DESC) AS RW, FREE_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP FROM FREEBOARD) N WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY N.FREE_NO DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD (NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, IP) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), 0, #{ip})
